SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.api.restartable.Restartable
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.core.managers.DatabaseManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebuggable, IRestartable
@Singleton public final class DatabaseManager extends Restartable implements IDebuggable
Manages all database interactions.
Author:
Pim

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum

    Represents the result of an action requested from the database.

    DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifier
     
    static final class 
    DatabaseManager.StructureInsertResult
    Contains the result of an attempt to insert a structure into the database.

    • addStructure

      public CompletableFuture<DatabaseManager.StructureInsertResult> addStructure(AbstractStructure structure)
      Inserts a AbstractStructure into the database and assumes that the structure was NOT created by an IPlayer. See addStructure(AbstractStructure, IPlayer).
      Parameters:
      structure - The new AbstractStructure.
      Returns:
      The future result of the operation. If the operation was successful this will be true.

    • addStructure

      public CompletableFuture<DatabaseManager.StructureInsertResult> addStructure(AbstractStructure structure, @Nullable @Nullable IPlayer responsible)
      Inserts a AbstractStructure into the database.
      Parameters:
      structure - The new AbstractStructure.
      responsible - The IPlayer responsible for creating the structure. This is used for the IStructurePrepareCreateEvent and the IStructureCreatedEvent. This may be null.
      Returns:
      The future result of the operation.

    • deleteStructure

      public CompletableFuture<DatabaseManager.ActionResult> deleteStructure(AbstractStructure structure)
      Removes a AbstractStructure from the database and assumes that the structure was NOT deleted by an IPlayer. See deleteStructure(AbstractStructure, IPlayer).
      Parameters:
      structure - The structure that will be deleted.
      Returns:
      The future result of the operation.

    • deleteStructure

      public CompletableFuture<DatabaseManager.ActionResult> deleteStructure(AbstractStructure structure, @Nullable @Nullable IPlayer responsible)
      Removes a AbstractStructure from the database.
      Parameters:
      structure - The structure that will be deleted.
      responsible - The IPlayer responsible for creating the structure. This is used for the IStructurePrepareDeleteEvent. This may be null.
      Returns:
      The future result of the operation.

    • getStructuresInChunk

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructuresInChunk(int chunkX, int chunkZ)
      Gets a list of structure UIDs that have their rotation point in a given chunk.
      Parameters:
      chunkX - The x-coordinate of the chunk (in chunk space).
      chunkZ - The z-coordinate of the chunk (in chunk space).
      Returns:
      A list of structure UIDs that have their rotation point in a given chunk.

    • getStructuresOfType

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructuresOfType(String typeName)
      Obtains all structures of a given type.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type. See StructureType.getFullName().
      Returns:
      All structures of the given type.

    • getStructuresOfType

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructuresOfType(String typeName, int version)
      Obtains all structures of a specific version of a given type.
      Parameters:
      typeName - The name of the type. See StructureType.getFullName().
      version - The version of the type.
      Returns:
      All structures of the given type and version.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(UUID playerUUID, String structureID)
      Gets all AbstractStructure owned by a player. Only searches for AbstractStructure with a given name if one was provided.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the payer.
      structureID - The name or the UID of the AbstractStructure to search for. Can be null.
      Returns:
      All AbstractStructure owned by a player with a specific name.

    • getStructures

      See getStructures(UUID, String).

      Gets all AbstractStructure owned by a player.

      playerUUID - The UUID of the player.
      Returns:
      All AbstractStructure owned by a player.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(IPlayer player)
      See getStructures(UUID).

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(UUID playerUUID, String name, PermissionLevel maxPermission)
      Gets all AbstractStructure owned by a player with a specific name.
      Parameters:
      playerUUID - The UUID of the payer.
      name - The name of the AbstractStructure to search for.
      maxPermission - The maximum level of ownership (inclusive) this player has over the AbstractStructures.
      Returns:
      All AbstractStructure owned by a player with a specific name.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(String name)
      Gets all AbstractStructures with a specific name, regardless over ownership.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the AbstractStructures.
      Returns:
      All AbstractStructures with a specific name.

    • updatePlayer

      public CompletableFuture<Boolean> updatePlayer(IPlayer player)
      Updates the name of a player in the database, to make sure the player's name and UUID don't go out of sync.
      Parameters:
      player - The Player.
      Returns:
      The future result of the operation. If the operation was successful this will be true.

    • getPlayerData

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<PlayerData>> getPlayerData(UUID uuid)
      Tries to find the PlayerData for a player with the given UUID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of a player.
      Returns:
      The PlayerData that represents the player.

    • getPlayerData

      public CompletableFuture<List<PlayerData>> getPlayerData(String playerName)
      Tries to get all the players with a given name. Because names are not unique, this may result in any number of matches.

      If you know the player's UUID, it is recommended to use getPlayerData(UUID) instead.

      Parameters:
      playerName - The name of the player(s).
      Returns:
      All the players with the given name.

    • getStructure

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure(long structureUID)
      Gets the AbstractStructure with a specific UID.
      Parameters:
      structureUID - The UID of the AbstractStructure.
      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure if it exists.

    • getStructure

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure(IPlayer player, long structureUID)
      Gets the AbstractStructure with the given UID owned by the player. If the given player does not own the provided structure, no structure will be returned.
      Parameters:
      player - The IPlayer.
      structureUID - The UID of the AbstractStructure.
      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure with the given UID if it exists and the provided player owns it.

    • getStructure

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure(UUID uuid, long structureUID)
      Gets the AbstractStructure with the given UID owned by the player. If the given player does not own the * provided structure, no structure will be returned.
      Parameters:
      uuid - The UUID of the player.
      structureUID - The UID of the AbstractStructure.
      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure with the given UID if it exists and the provided player owns it.

      Parameters:

      structureName - The name of the structure.

      player - The IPlayer.

      Remove a IPlayer as owner of a AbstractStructure.
      Parameters:
      structure - The AbstractStructure.
      player - The IPlayer.
      Returns:
      True if owner removal was successful.

    • removeOwner

      player - The IPlayer.
      responsible - The IPlayer responsible for creating the structure. This is used for the IStructurePrepareDeleteEvent. This may be null.

      Parameters:

    • syncStructureData

      public CompletableFuture<DatabaseManager.ActionResult> syncStructureData(StructureSnapshot snapshot, String typeData)
      Updates the all data of an AbstractStructure. This includes both the base data and the type-specific data.
      Parameters:
      snapshot - The AbstractStructure that describes the base data of structure.
      typeData - The type-specific data of this structure represented as a json String.
      Returns:
      The result of the operation.

    • getIdentifiersFromPartial

      public CompletableFuture<List<DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifier>> getIdentifiersFromPartial(String input, @Nullable @Nullable IPlayer player, PermissionLevel maxPermission)
      Retrieves all DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifiers that start with the provided input.

      For example, this method can retrieve the identifiers "1", "10", "11", "100", etc from an input of "1" or "MyDoor", "MyPortcullis", "MyOtherStructure", etc. from an input of "My".

      Parameters:
      input - The partial identifier to look for.
      player - The player that should own the structures. May be null to disregard ownership.
      Returns:
      All DatabaseManager.StructureIdentifiers that start with the provided input.

      public String getDebugInformation()
      Description copied from interface: IDebuggable
      Gets the debug information for this object.
      Specified by:
      getDebugInformation in interface IDebuggable
      Returns:
      The debug information or null if there's nothing to log at this time.
